casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bobby Ray GRADY 249P11-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Bobby Grady, Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Grady, Bobby R. K. D. Sturgis, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of June 2018 by Defendant for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
